about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT:

A beautiful collection of 30 Full HD wallpapers, containing hand-drawn comic style arts with characters and locations from the 9 Monkeys of Shaolin game.

All images will be available in the game folder in two variations - with and without game logo.

INCLUDES:
  • 30 HD-quality wallpapers.
  • 30 mobile wallpapers.

CREDITS:

Artist: Nikolay Ponarin
detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!


OUT NOW

Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OSX 10.7.5
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 9xxx / ATI 2xxx
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
